title: Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area: Volunteer
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Volunteer             Volunteer            Internships Available for College Students Please visit the internship website to learn more about the challenging and rewarding internship opportunities available for college students. Internships are designed to be curriculum specific for students. Please see you college counceleor to find out about possible credit.
